name: Foozy-Ball
description:
Play in browser above or Download.

Foozy-Ball is a  fun take on a classic past time, foosball.

Foozy-Ball is sure to be the must have this season, with its top of the line graphics and state of the art physics, you would think you were actually in the game! 

Don't miss out on this hot gotta have debut title from bigToeStudios.


Can be played with keyboard or with a controller (xbox).

CONTROLS: 

JOYSTICKS (WASD/ ARROWS)  - MOVE AND KICK

TRIGGERS (SHIFTS )  WHILE KICK - HARD KICK

X (TAB) - RESPAWN BALL
